en_title: Third of Attacks Now Use Stolen Credentials
cn_title: 三分之一攻擊現在使用盜取憑證
en_summary: Roughly a third of attacks now use stolen credentials according to the latest cybersecurity report.
cn_summary: 根據最新網絡安全報告，大約三分之一的攻擊現在都使用盜取的憑證。

en_title: Fake Milano Cortina Sites Target Thousands
cn_title: 假冒米蘭科爾蒂納網站詐騙數千人
en_summary: Cybersecurity firm warns that fake Milano Cortina sites are targeting thousands with discount scams.
cn_summary: 網絡安全公司警告稱假冒米蘭科爾蒂納網站正以折扣詐騙為目標瞄準數千人。

en_title: Iranian Threat Group Debuts New Attack Strains
cn_title: 伊朗威脅組織推出新型攻擊變種
en_summary: The long-active Iranian threat group debuted various attack strains and payloads in attacks against organizations in the Middle East and Africa.
cn_summary: 長期活躍的伊朗威脅組織在中東和非洲針對各組織的攻擊中推出了多種攻擊變種和負載。

en_title: CISA Adds Roundcube Flaws to KEV Catalog
cn_title: CISA 將 Roundcube 漏洞加入已知漏洞目錄
en_summary: The U.S. Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency added two security flaws impacting Roundcube webmail software to its Known Exploited Vulnerabilities catalog.
cn_summary: 美國網絡安全和基礎設施安全局將影響 Roundcube 網絡郵件軟件的兩個安全漏洞加入其已知被利用漏洞目錄。

en_title: OpenAI Deepens India Push via Pine Labs Partnership
cn_title: OpenAI 攜手 Pine Labs 進軍印度 Fintech
en_summary: OpenAI partnered with major Indian fintech Pine Labs to integrate AI-driven reasoning into its payments stack, aiming to automate invoicing workflows.
cn_summary: OpenAI 與印度頂尖 Fintech 公司 Pine Labs 達成戰略合作，將 AI 推理技術整合至支付系統。

en_title: Nvidia Nears $30 Billion Investment in OpenAI
cn_title: Nvidia 擬向 OpenAI 注資約 300 億美元
en_summary: Nvidia is close to finalizing a $30 billion investment in OpenAI as part of a mega fundraising round, tightening ties between the AI chip giant and the leading AI lab.
cn_summary: Nvidia 接近敲定一項對 OpenAI 高達 300 億美元的投資，作為其超過千億級別融資的一部分，進一步鞏固兩家 AI 巨頭的聯盟。

en_title: Italian PM Comments on French Affairs
cn_title: 意大利總理評論法國事務引發爭議
en_summary: As Italy cracks down on migration, Milan takes a different path offering shelter to asylum seekers even as the government tightens borders.
cn_summary: 意大利打擊移民之際，米蘭採取不同路徑為尋求庇護者提供住所。

en_title: U.S.-Iran Tensions Threaten Middle East Oil
cn_title: 美伊緊張局勢威脅中東石油供應
en_summary: A serious military confrontation between the U.S. and Iran could trigger a major disruption in Middle East oil supplies.
cn_summary: 美國與伊朗之間的嚴重軍事對抗可能引發中東石油供應的重大中斷。

en_title: Trump Threatens Countries Over Tariff Deals
cn_title: 特朗普威脅各國遵守關稅協議
en_summary: President Donald Trump threatened countries around the world to abide by any tariff deals they agreed to despite the U.S. Supreme Court striking down his sweeping global tariffs.
cn_summary: 美國總統特朗普威脅各國遵守關稅協議，儘管美國最高法院已推翻他的全面全球關稅政策。
